## Compiler.compile() method

Returns a [Compiler instance](/api/bud-framework/compiler/instance) when provided with a valid [Configuration](//bud-framework/configuration)

Signature:

```typescript
compile(): Promise<any>;
```

Returns:

Promise&lt;any&gt;

## Example 1

```js
bud.compiler.compile();
```

## Example 2

```js
bud.compiler.compile([
  {
    entry: { app: "foo.js" },
  },
]);
```
